name: Tavern Tricks
description:
Tavern Tricks, a transformation text game.

You and ten online friends decide to meet in person at a bar you've never been to before. You're the first to arrive and will soon discover it's a tavern full of anthropomorphic animals!

This game contains adult M/M sexual content.

This is Version 1.01 of Tavern Tricks. You can find more games on my Patreon, discord, and FurAffinity accounts with the specific links listed on the first page of the actual game. If you would like to support me, then become a patron at https://www.patreon.com/desirelines and you will receive access to early content and strategy guides for my games.
